abstract: COMPANY REPORTS It is a light week for earnings, with reports coming from Tiffany and Walgreen (Monday); SAIC (Tuesday); Oracle (Wednesday); the Apollo Group, ConAgra Foods, Lennar and Red Hat (Thursday); and KB Home (Friday).
